__e: Discover what God's eternal plan for the church is.

And again, this blood is only a drop, flowing by in the eternal stream of the life of your people, whom you owe everything, and whose source of origin therefore is the deepest and highest you can subserviently bow to in childlike awe.
Oh, Wakantanka, Great Spirit of the Sun, source of all life, created in violence, pleasure and pain, which then takes life to sustain life, in the eternal cycle of life and death -
"For this world, act as if you were eternal, for the next, as if you must die tomorrow."
Her feeling make a mother what she is her unlimited abnegation for her children.
